fullText: Laura Osnes makes a lovely Cinderella, with a crystalline soprano that gives the familiar songs a fresh sparkle, and Santino Fontana is a charming Prince Christopher who gets to sing as well as he acts.
dtliExcerpt: Laura Osnes makes a lovely Cinderella, with a crystalline soprano that gives the familiar songs a fresh sparkle, and Santino Fontana is a charming Prince Christopher who gets to sing as well as he acts.
bwwExcerpt: Helmer Mark Brokaw...has cast this show shrewdly, with actors who can sing, get their laughs, and in one crucial case especially, even dance. That triple threat is Osnes...While her light soprano gives sweet voice to Ella, Osnes' acting chops and dancing skills make her as lovely to watch as she is to listen to...The cheeky humor of Beane's book comes from imposing modern sensibilities (and contemporary lingo) on timeless storybook figures....But all these clever alterations radically change the
